pr_title: Qute value resolver generator - always skip static methods

timeline.message:
Qute value resolver generator - always skip static methods

- resolves #6396
- also add TemplateData#ignoreSubclasses()

Qute value resolver generator - always skip static methods

- resolves #6396
- also add TemplateData#ignoreSubclasses()

timeline.bodyText: This suspiciously looks like it should be ignoreSuperclasses no?
timeline.author: FroMage

replies.bodyText: Eh, yes it's a wrong name! Thanks for spotting this. I'll send a follow-up PR shortly.
replies.author: mkouba
